pullRequest.title: Delete code for obsolete Harmony support
pullRequest.bodyText:
Includes removing the j9vmi library.
Also OPT_PASS which is unused and depends on OPT_HARMONY.

beforeCommit.message:
Delete code for obsolete Harmony support

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Delete code for obsolete Harmony support

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Why should we keep this line?
I don't think there's much value in keeping this comment.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,7 +52,7 @@
 #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_UNUSED10 10 /* #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_JIT 10 */
 #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_UNUSED11 11 /* #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_JIT_CODE_CACHE 11 */
 #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_UNUSED12 12 /* #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_JIT_DATA_CACHE 12 */
-#define J9MEM_CATEGORY_HARMONY 13
+#define J9MEM_CATEGORY_UNUSED13 13 /* #define J9MEM_CATEGORY_HARMONY 13 */
